Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photograph by stating it as the "Picture of the year" and a "proud moment for every Pakistani."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough evidence or support to prove the authenticity of the photograph.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph is real and portrays Imran Khan as a "towering international political figure."
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the possibility that the photograph is photoshopped or manipulated, as proven by fact-checkers.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph is not genuine and has been manipulated.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not consistently falter, but it does falter in terms of presenting an accurate representation of the photograph.
